name: Graydle Starstrider
text: While you control a face-up "Graydle" card: You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then, you can destroy 1 card on the field, and if you do, add 1 Graydle card from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only activate the effect of "Graydle Starstrider" once per turn.
